name: summarization_preference
description: Does the response capture the summary in the best possible way?

options.name: Excellent
options.description: The response includes details such as key figures, numbers, dates and details which are crucial for the entire understanding.

options.name: Good
options.description: The response includes statements expressing emotions and acclamations.

options.name: Average
options.description: The order of events in the response follows a suitable chronological order.

options.name: Poor
options.description: The response includes minor and irrelevant details which add no value in a summary.
